ELEMENT.CREATOR: JT
ELEMENT.TITLE: Big thumbnails for products
ELEMENT.SUMMARY: This layout offers a product list at the top of the page with 120x180 thumbnails in a four column format, followed by an editable text area. At the bottom of the page is a simple list of categories/subcategories.

ELEMENT.HTML:
"><% load($zoovy:prod_thumb); default(""); default($zoovy:prod_image1); image(w=>"120",h=>"180",tag=>"1",m=>"0",alt=>$zoovy:prod_name); print(); %>
" class='zlink'><% load($zoovy:prod_name); strip(length=>"60"); default(""); print(); %>
<% load($zoovy:base_price); default(""); format(money); print(); %>

ELEMENT.HELP:
When setting up links inside text or text boxes, be sure to use the proper linking syntax. Failure to do so can cause your customers cart to mysteriously empty.

Go to http://www.zoovydocs.com/doc-50355 for more information on how to properly set up your links.
